subject: JUnit 4.8.1 in maven repository?
msgSnippet: I see that JUnit 4.8.1 has been released.  The newest version in the maven repository (http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/) is 4.7. Can someone add the
messageBody:
I see that JUnit 4.8.1 has been released. The newest version in the
maven repository (http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/junit/junit/) is 4.7.
Can someone add the newer versions to the maven repository?

Thanks.
